text: oh, preposterous. i have been solely responsible for this university's six loop quantum gravity calculations, i have changed the way we think about bose-einstein condensates, and i am also the one who got nutter butters in the cafeteria vending machine. maybe you missed that news while you were floating around like a goof in outer space. now, if you'll excuse me, i have work to do.
